data.description: CORSAIR is seeking a highly motivated Reverse Logistics Data Engineering Intern to help design and automate data solutions that power our returns and serialization processes. This hands-on internship offers experience in building scalable databases, streamlining workflows, and applying AI-driven tools to improve operational efficiency. Youâ€™ll gain exposure to reverse logistics and data engineering best practices while contributing to projects that enhance reporting, traceability, and automation across the business.
